@notice modifier requires that the address calling a function is a replication
@dev this imports function from replication block generator
nodes.name: onlyReplication

nodes.documentation: @notice constructor sets up outside contract addresses at deployemnt through truffle dark arts
@notice folowing three function allow for contract upgrades
nodes.name: setRepGBAdd

nodes.documentation: @notice buyChaosCoin allows anyone to exchange ether for ChaosCoin
nodes.name: buyChaosCoin

nodes.documentation: @notice cahsOut allows ChaosCoin to be cashed out into ether
nodes.name: cashOut

nodes.name: getRandomNum

nodes.documentation: @notice placeBet Allows a User to place a bet
